PageTitle: diameter gx attribute used-service-unit include cc-output-octets
FuncDef:
The diameter gx attribute used-service-unit include cc-output-octets command enables the device to report to a Diameter server the downstream VAS traffic used by each prepaid user.
The undo diameter gx attribute used-service-unit include cc-output-octets command restores the default configuration.
By default, the device reports to a Diameter server only the total VAS traffic used by each prepaid user.
CLIs: diameter gx attribute used-service-unit include cc-output-octets
undo diameter gx attribute used-service-unit include cc-output-octets
Examples: [~HUAWEI] diameter gx attribute used-service-unit include cc-output-octets
[~HUAWEI] undo diameter gx attribute used-service-unit include cc-output-octets
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the BRAS device to report to a Diameter server the downstream VAS (BOD) traffic used by each prepaid user, run the diameter gx attribute used-service-unit include cc-output-octets command. After the command is run, the device reports the downlink VAS traffic used by each prepaid user.
Configuration Impact
After the diameter gx attribute used-service-unit include cc-output-octets command is run, the Diameter server can decrease user quotas based on the downstream traffic used by each prepaid user.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
